summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ramadan countdown website with admin panel and display functionality
passed_tests: Backend API connectivity and root endpoint
TVC Videos CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Berbuka Videos CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Maghrib Schedules CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Display state endpoint returns correct state based on schedule
Frontend display page loads correctly in TVC mode
Admin panel loads with all three tabs (TVC, Berbuka, Schedule)
TVC video management - add, edit, delete, toggle active status
Berbuka video management - add with duration, edit, delete, toggle active
Schedule management - add with date picker and time input, edit, delete
Navigation between admin panel and display page
Real-time status updates and data synchronization
